source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_SEQ_00<tab>Lyse is eager to return triumphant to Mol Iloh.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_SEQ_00<tab>Лиз торопится триумфально вернуться в стан Мол.

source:
TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_SEQ_01<tab>By your redoubtable display of courage and skill, you and your comrades are now anointed warriors of the Steppe. But before you can rejoice in your accomplishment, you find yourself surrounded by a party of Oronir, their leader demanding that you return with him to meet with his khan. Hien considers this an opportunity to learn more of his foes and soon-to-be allies, and so you all agree to follow the Oronir to the Dawn Throne, where their khan awaits.

The most radiant brother Magnai, leader of the Oronir and lord of the Dawn Throne, recognizes you as warriors of the Steppe. But there his respect ends. He demands that you acknowledge his supreme authority and pay tribute, and when Lyse and Hien balk at his presumption, his flash of anger makes clear that it may be wiser to humor the Oronir...for now.

TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_SEQ_02<tab>Magnai is pleased to see you step forward first, and states that there is much to be done in preparation for the Naadam. The details of the duties he would demand from you, however, shall be given by Baatu, the warrior who commanded your escort from Bardam's Mettle.
TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_LYSE_000_000<tab>Well, we've done what we came to do. Let's head back to Mol Iloh.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_LYSE_000_000<tab>Что ж, мы сделали то, за чем пришли. Настала пора вернуться в стан Мол.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_LYSE_000_010<tab>I know, I know, I probably should've left the talking to everyone else...
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_LYSE_000_010<tab>Знаю, знаю, я должна была оставить разговорчики всем остальным...

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_HIEN_000_015<tab>Pretentious and preening he may be, but doubt not that he is a warrior. You saw the axe by his throne...and the rage in his eyes.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_HIEN_000_015<tab>Претенциозное дитя... Но без сомнений, он воин. Ты <var 08 E905 ((сама видела)) ((сам видел)) /var> топор у его трона... и ярость в его глазах.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_GOSETSU_000_020<tab>Favor, tribute...how easily the language of tyrants tumbles from this khan's lips.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_GOSETSU_000_020<tab>Поклонение, дань... как легко слова тиранов слетают с губ хана.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_BAATU_000_025<tab>You will conduct yourself with utmost propriety in Magnai's presence. Or face consequences.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_BAATU_000_025<tab>Вы будете вести себя как подобает в присутствии Магная. Иначе ответите.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_040<tab>So you are the first to step forward. Hmm. Bold...or reckless. I see why Daidukul favors you.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_040<tab>Итак, ты <var 08 E905 ((первая выступила)) ((первый выступил)) /var> вперёд. Хм-м. Смело... или глупо. Теперь я понимаю, почему ты нравишься Даидакулу.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_041<tab>...Were I Buduga, I might take offense.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_041<tab>...Был бы я из Будуга, начал бы дёргаться.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_042<tab>But I know better than to dismiss a woman outright. You demonstrate boldness...or recklessness. Time will tell.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_042<tab>Но я понимаю, что нельзя недооценивать женщину. Особенно демонстрирующую такую смелость... или это просто глупость? Время покажет.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_043<tab>The Naadam approaches, and the Oronir will reign supreme once more. Such is the will of Father Azim.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_043<tab>Наадам приближается, и Оронир снова будут править. Такова воля Отца Азима.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_044<tab>Yet only fools think to triumph by the grace of the gods alone─and we are not fools.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_044<tab>Но только дураки верят, что могут победить лишь волею богов — а мы не дураки.

source: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_045<tab>Your task will be to aid us in our preparations. Baatu will tell you the rest.
target: TEXT_STMBDA409_02508_MAGNAI_000_045<tab>Вашей задачей станет помочь нам в приготовлениях. Баату расскажет обо всём подробнее.
